alert.note: Alert for Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 27 at 2:01PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT FOR THE KERN COUNTY MOUNTAINS FROM 3 AM SUNDAY THROUGH 10 PM MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES. .Critical fire weather conditions will occur in the Kern County mountains from early Sunday morning through Monday evening. The onset of northeasterly winds late Saturday night will result in rapid drying, with widespread minimum relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent Sunday afternoon and Monday afternoon. The strongest winds are anticipated Sunday afternoon, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY NORTHEAST WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 595, 596, AND 597... The National Weather Service in Hanford has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 3 AM Sunday to 10 PM PDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...The Kern County mountains. * WIND...The strongest winds are expected Sunday afternoon, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent both Sunday afternoon and Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area
